pages.text: The ak47 Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Relaxed
ak47 Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
ak47 Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
ak47 Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting ak47 Weed in an Extractor
You can package your ak47 weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
